159 // Return the normal vector of the contact
163 inline Vector3 ContactPoint::getNormal() const {
164  return mNormal;
165 }
166 
167 // Return the contact point on the first proxy shape in the local-space of the proxy shape
171 inline const Vector3& ContactPoint::getLocalPointOnShape1() const {
172  return mLocalPointOnShape1;
173 }
174 
175 // Return the contact point on the second proxy shape in the local-space of the proxy shape
179 inline const Vector3& ContactPoint::getLocalPointOnShape2() const {
180  return mLocalPointOnShape2;
181 }
182 
183 // Return the cached penetration impulse
187 inline decimal ContactPoint::getPenetrationImpulse() const {
188  return mPenetrationImpulse;
189 }
190 
191 // Return true if the contact point is similar (close enougth) to another given contact point
192 inline bool ContactPoint::isSimilarWithContactPoint(const ContactPointInfo* localContactPointBody1) const {
193  return (localContactPointBody1->localPoint1 - mLocalPointOnShape1).lengthSquare() <= (mWorldSettings.persistentContactDistanceThreshold *
194  mWorldSettings.persistentContactDistanceThreshold);
195 }
196 
197 // Set the cached penetration impulse
201 inline void ContactPoint::setPenetrationImpulse(decimal impulse) {
202  mPenetrationImpulse = impulse;
203 }
204 
205 // Return true if the contact is a resting contact
209 inline bool ContactPoint::getIsRestingContact() const {
210  return mIsRestingContact;
211 }
212 
213 // Set the mIsRestingContact variable
217 inline void ContactPoint::setIsRestingContact(bool isRestingContact) {
218  mIsRestingContact = isRestingContact;
219 }
220 
221 // Return true if the contact point is obsolete
225 inline bool ContactPoint::getIsObsolete() const {
226  return mIsObsolete;
227 }
228 
229 // Set to true to make the contact point obsolete
233 inline void ContactPoint::setIsObsolete(bool isObsolete) {
234  mIsObsolete = isObsolete;
235 }
236 
237 // Return the next contact point in the linked list
241 inline ContactPoint* ContactPoint::getNext() const {
242  return mNext;
243 }
244 
245 // Set the next contact point in the linked list
249 inline void ContactPoint::setNext(ContactPoint* next) {
250  mNext = next;
251 }
252

257 inline ContactPoint* ContactPoint::getPrevious() const {
258  return mPrevious;
259 }
260

265 inline void ContactPoint::setPrevious(ContactPoint* previous) {

267 }
268 
269 // Return the penetration depth of the contact

274  return mPenetrationDepth;
275 }
276 
277 // Return the number of bytes used by the contact point
281 inline size_t ContactPoint::getSizeInBytes() const {
282  return sizeof(ContactPoint);
283 }
